short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Features that are missing on Postmark

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Postmark Tools makes you able to:
- Download attachments on sandbox emails
- Other features to come

You can find the source code here:
https://github.com/DumbTechLion/postmark-tools-chrome
